Games developed exclusively for PS3 looks great overall, however, if it is multi-platform -- graphically wise, xbox 360 is greater than PS3 particularly in draw distance, textures, and shadows.

It's easier to run games in the xbox but if you have a fully customize PS3 firmware, extra thumbdrives and external drives -- rebug/debug and of those 4.30 CFW, then it's fair.

Value wise... PS3 > Xbox, clearly -- because of the bluray player.

Mine works on 3.55 kmeaw.. Here's what I do

-im using the fix "BLES01698_Retail-fix by opoisso893" (google it)
-Just enable the "BD-Mirror".The option is available in the "Game Settings" menu for each game in the list Multiman 4.18 or higher

-Also insert an original Game Disc (im using AC2)

-Load thru Multiman and choose to PLAY the game disc inserted (which will be change to DMC game once multiman loads DMC)
